error.message: Parameter $event of method Drupal\brightcove_proxy\EventSubscriber\BrightcoveProxyInitSubscriber::initializeBrightcoveClientProxy() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use RequestEvent instead
Call to deprecated function file_save_data(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\file\FileRepositoryInterface::writeData() instead.

Parameter $event of method Drupal\brightcove\EventSubscriber\BrightcoveInitSubscriber::initializeBrightcoveClient() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use RequestEvent instead

Parameter $event of method Drupal\brightcove\EventSubscriber\RedirectResponseSubscriber::checkIgnoreDestination() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\FilterResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ResponseEvent instead
Call to deprecated function file_create_url(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use the appropriate method on \Drupal\Core\File\FileUrlGeneratorInterface instead.
